Description.Text: The Belvedere Hotel is a New York Art Deco monument providing elegant lodging accommodations to the world's most discerning travelers since 1928.The Belvedere Hotel in Manhattan is the premier choice for New York City lodging. Featuring spacious quarters and a rich selection of amenities, the hotel provides the most distinctive source of first-class accommodations in New York City.The Luxurious seventeen-story Belvedere Hotel offers 400 guestroom accommodations, each specially appointed to maximize the traveler's comfort and convenience.Located at the edge of the Theater District, this Midtown New York City hotel is three blocks from Rockefeller Center and about five blocks from Times Square.

Walking distance to:Times Square, Midtown Business District, Rockefeller Center, Radio City, Music Hall, Central Park, Fashionable 5th Avenue, Shopping Carnegie Hall, Metropolitan Museum of Art, ST. Patrick Cathedral, Short Taxi cab ride to Jacob Javits Convention Center.
The 17-story Belvedere offers 400 guestrooms. Spacious 900 square feet, The Empire Room is ideal for executive board meetings, intimate training sessions, and private gathering.

Central Park, 11 blocks north of this New York hotel, offers a variety of recreational opportunities, including ball fields, tennis courts, rowboat rentals, horseback riding, and miles of trails for hiking, biking, running, and in-line skating. Rockefeller Center's famed skating rink, three blocks east, opens in winter, as does Central Park's Wollman Rink.
Check In Time: 4:00 Pm Check Out Time: Noon

Driving directions from LaGuardia Airport: Take Grand Central Pkwy west to I-278 (Brooklyn-Queens Expy) west. Exit to SR 25A and bear right onto Queens Plaza N. Continue on Queensboro Bridge and exit to 2nd Ave south. Turn left on 2nd Ave, then turn right on E 57th St. Turn left on 9th Ave, then turn left on W 48th St.

Churrascaria Plataforma - Expansive and popular Brazilian restaurant (independently operated). Rodizio-style lunch and dinner starring grilled meats sliced from skewers at the table. Salad/vegetable bar, too. Brazilian band Tuesday through Saturday evenings. Belvedere Café - Breakfast restaurant. Buffet, à la carte, and Continental breakfasts daily. Red-velvet chairs, banquettes.
